skills.skill: Computer Proficiency (MS Office, Outlook, and related applications)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft quotes, proposals, scopes of work, and bills of materials for cabling/camera projects.
Maintain strong knowledge of information technology, design process, and estimating principles.
Update job knowledge by studying new product descriptions and participating in training opportunities.
Manage multiple projects/estimates, meet bid schedules and deadlines, and respond to Requests for Information (RFI) and Requests for Proposals (RFP).
Conduct presales job walks, document hardware, and create detailed bills of materials, floor plans, and pathway designs.
Contact vendors for price comparison, attend pre-bid meetings/conferences, and support project turnover meetings.
Ensure accuracy and thoroughness of all project-related testing, certification, warranty submittals, drawings, builds, and deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, construction management, technical, or related field preferred. (Master's preferred)
